item.description:
Spring is right around the corner - so let's get out of the house, meet some great people and get your groove on! Saint is one of my favorite spots in Boston, with dancing in one room and a lounge area in another.

FOR NEW MEMBERS: You know who you are. Perhaps you joined but never got around to coming to an event. Perhaps you are a little shy about meeting new people.... or you are not so sure about this meetup thing.... well, put ALL of that aside. This is a great opportunity to meet other new members and see what this group is all about! Please arrive at 8pm.

FOR RETURNING MEMBERS: To those who have come out with us previously - you are the heart of the group and it has been a pleasure meeting everyone. One of the best parts about this meetup is getting people together and seeing new and lasting friendships being formed on the spot. I expect to see you this Friday at 9pm!

AS ALWAYS, feel free to bring friend or two, and we will see you FRIDAY!

DETAILS: New member meeting time is 8pm / Returning members meeting time is 9pm. Meeting spot is Domani Bar at the Copley Square Hotel (47 Huntington Ave at Exeter St). We will head over to Saint around 9:45-10pm to beat the lines. Please meet us before 9:30pm, as you may not find us later. Cover: $15-$20.

FIND THE ORGANIZER: My picture is located on the left-hand side of the site. For help/questions, my cell: 646.541.0708.

Saint is an upscale venue, so please dress appropriately. Domani and Saint are right around the corner from each other, at Exeter St and Huntington Ave.

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: New Member Meetup and More @ Saint THIS FRIDAY!
